DOC.brief_title: Saline With Alcohol TransUrethral Resection aNd Photoselective Vaporisation Prostate
DOC.detailed_description: Aim evaluate amount absorb saline irrigation fluid transurethral therapy benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) . We want differentiate two different method surgical therapy : TransUrethral Resection Saline ( TURiS ) Photoselective Vaporisation Prostate ( PVP ) . Both method use saline irrigation . To measure amount absorb saline irrigation fluid , add pure Ethanol Irrigation fluid result 0,02 % ethanol contain saline irrigation fluid . The conventional TransUrethral Resection Prostate ( TUR ) method use electrolyte free irrigation . In literature method well know occurence transurethral resection syndrome ( `` TUR syndrome '' ) . This caused absorption electrolyte-free irrigating fluid , follow hyponatraemic hyperhydration , consist symptom circulatory nervous Systems .
DOC.criteria: Patients TURiS PVP perform Alcoholics , Patients severe hepatic impairment , Epilepsy , Existing metabolic acidosis .
